1.instruction: Create a detailed PRD for the financial control system for couples, including user stories, wireframes, and technical requirements. Key features include: user authentication, shared accounts management, transaction tracking (income/expenses), categorization, dashboard with charts, and responsive design.

2.instruction: Design the software architecture, including frontend structure (React/TypeScript/Tailwind), backend integration (Spring Boot/PostgreSQL), and Supabase configuration for authentication and real-time data sync. Reference PRD at '/absolute/path/to/financial-control-system/docs/prd.json'.

3.instruction: Implement the financial control system using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Follow the provided HTML/CSS template and integrate with Supabase for backend services. Follow the architecture design at '/absolute/path/to/financial-control-system/docs/architecture.json'.
